info.name: Cricket Fantasy API
info.description: Complete Postman collection for Cricket Fantasy App API v1. Set the `base_url` and `token` variables before using protected endpoints.

request.description: Register a new user. `user_type` can be `user` or `admin`. Token is auto-saved to collection variables on success.
Login and get Bearer token. Token is auto-saved.
Returns authenticated user profile and stats (total teams, contests, winnings).
Returns platform stats, user stats, recent teams/contests, and upcoming matches.
Returns match details plus all players for that match.
Create a team with exactly 11 players. `captain_id` gets 2x points, `vice_captain_id` gets 1.5x points.
Returns step-by-step guide and full points scoring system (batting, bowling, fielding).
Platform-wide stats + recent teams and contests. Requires admin token.
Create a new contest. `type` can be: mega, head-to-head, practice, standard.
Team codes auto-resolve flag emojis and colors. Supported codes: IND, AUS, ENG, PAK, SA, NZ, WI, SL, BAN, AFG, MI, CSK, RCB, KKR, DC, SRH, RR, PBKS, LSG
`type` must be one of: deposit, withdrawal, refund, prize
Revenue, deposits, withdrawals, prizes, user growth, top users, popular contests. Defaults to last 30 days.
